title: Command Poster Strips, Damage Free Hanging Poster Hangers, No Tools Wall Hanging Strips for Posters, 136 White Command Adhesive Strips
description: Command White Poster Strips let you decorate how you want, when you want, without damaging your walls and surfaces. A great home improvement item, these damage free hanging strips stick on a variety of smooth surfaces without leaving holes, marks or sticky residue. Use these wall adhesive strips to hang your favorite photographs, kid’s artwork, banners and signs. Simply mount these poster hanging strips on painted walls, finished wood, painted concrete cinder blocks, laminate, glass, metal and tiles and enjoy displaying your favorite poster decorations. Perfect for home renovators and college students, use these Command Poster Strips in your home, office, apartment or dorm room to elevate the appearance of your living or working space without tools. Directions are included; follow the directions closely to use the wall hanging strips as intended. A clever decorating and organizing solution that doesn’t damage surfaces, these poster hanging strips will help you fearlessly change your space. One package contains 136 white poster strips to hang up to 34 posters or signs. Decorate, organize and celebrate damage free with Command.
